post.desc: A new phase of Pure Fiction has begun! Have you managed to clear it, Trailblazer? Mimo has brought brand-new benefits, and welcomes all Trailblazers to share their own lineups! How to Participate: Publish the lineup you used to clear any Pure Fiction stage via the Honkai: Star Rail Lineup Assistant tool and, when publishing, select any topic before posting it to HoYoLAB to qualify as a participant in the event
